member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.DotCoverLicenseRegistryInstaller.InstallStatic(JetBrains.Application.Install.Installer)
member.summary: Called once on the object during the registration process.
member.param: The installer object that provides the installation data.
member.returns: The list of the Registry entries to write, or Null if none.

member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.DotCoverLicenseRegistryInstaller.InstallInstance(JetBrains.Application.Install.Installer,System.Object)
member.summary: Called for each of the attributes of the requested type encountered in the known assemblies.
member.param: The installer object that provides the installation data.
Instance of the attribute to process.
member.returns: The list of the Registry entries to write, or Null if none.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.ProductName
member.summary: The short ID-like product name, without any version suffixes.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.ProductFullName
member.summary: This full name is actually displayed in the User Interface in the About Boxes and such. It should include the short product name and the marketing version of the product. The bugfix upgate versions are visible thru this field only (eg “ProductName + " 3.0.2"”) and do not get into the actual technical file versions. Those can be found in the ProductInformation file linked into each of the projects.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.LicenseSeed
member.summary: The license state written to the Registry by the installer, which provides for a free trial.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.LicenseSupportIdentifier
member.summary: An identifier for the evaluation license. Change it to reset the evaluation period.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageName
member.summary: As in the package key! As supplied by Microsoft®! Note: you must also update the package key value in the Resources.resx file in the VS project, one with the ID equal to PackageKeyResourceId.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageCompany
member.summary: As in the package key! As supplied by Microsoft®!

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageVersion
member.summary: As in the package key! As supplied by Microsoft®!

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageEdition
member.summary: As in the package key! As supplied by Microsoft®!

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageProduct
member.summary: As in the package key! As supplied by Microsoft®!

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.PackageKeyResourceId
member.summary: Resource ID for the package key. See Resources.resx in the VS project.

member.name: F:JetBrains.dotCover.ShellBase.ProductInfo.ProductBirthDate
member.summary: The birth date of the product. Used for the lower copyright year and so on.
